How to add blog post for particle41?

- Hitesh Rawal | 6 January, 2017

We are using jekyll to build our static blog contents. If you wish to know more about jekyll and want to explore it in details then please visit its official site it has good documentations. To publish a blog post we just have to follow three simple steps.

  • Write a blog
  • Build jekyll
  • Publish to website

Write a blog

To start writing a blog you have to create a markdown(.md) file in _post directory. This is important that the file name should be in following format only.

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.md for eg: 2017-01-06-how-to-add-post.md

While writing a blog we have to keep in mind that this is the markdown file, so we have to follow markdown syntaxes. So that our contents or thoughts which we want to represent can be appear properly. There are lot of contents available on internet about markdonw syntax. Here I am adding one links for quick reference.

Build jekyll

Once the content is ready then we have to do jekyll build it will generate html file of our post. Make sure you will run this command from _blog directory.

Publish to website

Now all set and we want to publish this post, so we have to go to root directory i.e. www and execute gulp receipy.
